page.title: 11LIFE IN WOODFIELD DONCASTER
page.content: As a 14 year old girl I find this area very pleasant. Our house is within walking distance of my school, shops and large open spaces including a golf course. There is also a regular bus service to Doncaster. The school has a youth club with all the modern equipment in a nice new building and discos are run regularly. Some of my friends attitude is that life here is boring but I only get bored when it's raining. In the summer it is nice because you can walk round the golf course or just sunbathe. There is plenty of space everywhere. The sewage works may smell a bit unpleasant in the summer but after living in a place for 14 years you can get used to anything.
